personalInfo.residence: Ft. Worth, TX; plays out of Mira Vista CC

tourBios.otherInfo: Rookie on the 2000 BUY.COM TOUR...spent the 1999 season as a rookie on the PGA TOUR and made just six cuts in 31 events...finished 201st on the PGA TOUR money list last season...had two top-25 finishes...played in one BUY.COM TOUR event in 1999, finishing tied for 42nd at Shreveport Open...participated in the 1995 Phoenix Open as an amateur...has three competitive holes-in-one...two-time first-team All-American...member of Oklahoma State's 1995 NCAA Championship team...college teammate of fellow BUY.COM TOUR member Kris Cox...1994 College Player of the Year.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was 5th in 2000 at the BUY.COM South Carolina Classic.
